DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical research study is to assess the safety and tolerability of aripiprazole in patients with psychosis associated with Parkinson's disease.
DOC.brief_title: Aripiprazole in Patients With Psychosis Associated With Parkinson's Disease
DOC.criteria: Primary diagnosis of idiopathic Parkinson's disease. Psychosis related to Parkinson's disease. Psychosis present prior to diagnosis of Parkinson's disease.
